item.description:
Howdy! If you are looking for a different way to spend your Saturday evening come on out to the Midnight Rodeo Bar. So.....you've never had the chance to line dance? Come take Michelle's fun, easy lessons at 7:30.    BOBBY CARLSON AND STONES RIVER will keep us on the floor.   If you are looking to meet new people this is the place! Come join us! There is a meetup table located near the bar or feel free to sit with your friends. See ya there for a boot scoot'in good time! 
$10.00 cover charge
21 +

  Howdy and welcome new member DMI89!!!!! yeehaw!!

This Saturday is HAT Saturday!  wear ANY hat...your lucky fishing hat, cowboy hats, baseball caps....hideous fun hats!

Call:  Suni Patricia Dalbec

if anyone needs a hat or a different hat. call me I have over 40 hats at the shop (Cluttered Corners in Derry) that you can borrow if you like vintage and crazy ones. take your pick. 603-290-3308. shop number.
item.how_to_find_us: Meetup sign on a table before the bar on the right side of the room
item.name: Midnight Rodeo Bar Meetup
